get.description: Returns comprehensive dashboard data including order counts, revenue, popular items, member counts, booking stats, and daily trends

parameters.description: Menu item images (jpg, jpeg, png, webp, max 5MB each)
parameters.name: images

parameters.description: Menu item images (jpg, jpeg, png, webp, max 5MB each)
parameters.name: images

get.description: Get all orders for a restaurant with optional filters. Restaurant members see all orders.

parameters.description: Filter by status (pending, confirmed, preparing, ready, completed, cancelled)
parameters.name: status

post.description: Create a new order with items. Guest users can create orders without authentication.

get.description: Get details of a specific order. Restaurant members can view any order, non-members can only view their own orders.

put.description: Update an order with new items and status. Restaurant members can update any order, non-members can only update their own orders.

delete.description: Delete an order. Restaurant members can delete any order, non-members can only delete their own orders.

get.description: Get all payments for a restaurant

post.description: Create a payment for all active unpaid orders on a table. Sub-total and total are auto-calculated. Discount is optional (accepts float, e.g. 10.50).

delete.description: Delete a payment and reset related orders (for correction of mistakes)

post.description: Generate a unique token for guest ordering at a specific table. Token is valid for 3 hours. Restaurant members only.
